syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
  "workbench.startupEditor": "none",
  "workbench.settings.applyToAllProfiles": [
    "editor.mouseWheelZoom",
    "editor.fontFamily",
    "editor.fontSize",
    "window.title",
    "editor.quickSuggestions",
    "editor.suggestOnTriggerCharacters",
    "editor.parameterHints.enabled",
    "editor.hover.enabled",
    "editor.acceptSuggestionOnCommitCharacter"
  ],
  "editor.renderWhitespace": "all",
  "editor.cursorBlinking": "expand",
  "editor.mouseWheelZoom": true,
  "workbench.iconTheme": "vscode-icons",
  "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode",
  "editor.formatOnSave": true,
  "workbench.sideBar.location": "right",
  "editor.lineHeight": 27,
  "files.autoSave": "onWindowChange",
  "editor.fontFamily": "'Cascadia Code', Consolas, 'Courier New', monospace",
  "editor.renderLineHighlight": "none",
  "editor.matchBrackets": "near",
  "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
  "blade.format.enable": true,
  "window.customTitleBarVisibility": "windowed",
  "workbench.navigationControl.enabled": false,
  "workbench.activityBar.location": "top",
  "zenMode.centerLayout": false,
  "zenMode.fullScreen": false,
  "vetur.format.options.tabSize": 4,
  "editor.detectIndentation": false,
  "editor.tabSize": 3,
  "workbench.colorTheme": "Parsinta Exclusive",
  "glassit.alpha": 230,
  "emmet.includeLanguages": {
    "vue-html": "html",
    "javascript": "javascriptreact",
    "javascript-html": "html"
  },
  "liveSassCompile.settings.formats": [
    {
      "format": "expanded",
      "extensionName": ".css",
      "savePath": "/css",
      "savePathReplacementPairs": null
    }
  ],
  "editor.unicodeHighlight.nonBasicASCII": false,
  "editor.unicodeHighlight.invisibleCharacters": false,
  "window.newWindowDimensions": "maximized",
  "terminal.integrated.mouseWheelZoom": true,
  "terminal.integrated.tabs.defaultIcon": "copilot-large",
  "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.windows": "Git Bash",
  "window.title": "${dirty}${rootName}${separator}${profileName}${separator}${activeEditorShort}",
  "workbench.settings.showSuggestions": true,
  "editor.inlineSuggest.enabled": true,
  "editor.quickSuggestions": {
    "other": true,
    "comments": true,
    "strings": true
  },
  "editor.suggestOnTriggerCharacters": true,
  "editor.wordBasedSuggestions": "allDocuments",
  "editor.hover.enabled": true,
  "bootstrapIntelliSense": {
    "enable": false,
    "bsVersion": "5.3.6",
    "useLocalFile": false,
    "cssFilePath": "",
    "languageSupport": []
  },
"debug.disassemblyView.showSourceCode": false,
  "intelephense.environment.phpVersion": "8.2.0",
  "php.inlayHints.parameters.enabled": false,
  "php.inlayHints.parameters.suppressNameMatchingValue": true,
  "php.inlayHints.parameters.byReference": false,
  "php.inlayHints.types.lambdaParameter": false,
  "php.format.rules.callParametersNewLineAfterLeftParen": false,
  "php.format.rules.addCommaAfterLastCallParameter": false,
  "intelephense.completion.functionReturnType": false,
  "php.problems.exclude": {
    "**/*": ["php_remove_redundant_closing_tag"]
  },
  "github.copilot.enable": {
    "*": false,
    "plaintext": false,
    "markdown": false,
    "scminput": false,
    "php": false
  },
  "editor.snippetSuggestions": "inline",
  "editor.suggest.showSnippets": true,
  "[snippets]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.json-language-features"
  },
  "[php]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "junstyle.php-cs-fixer"
  },
  "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 13
}"}
